name: Downloadable Classroom Resources for Primary Teachers
description: A wide range of teacher-made printable resources to support curriculum delivery in primary and elementary classrooms. Includes worksheets, posters, classroom visuals, activity templates, and planning tools that complement videos and songs available on Silly School Education.

educationalAlignment.educationalFramework: UK National Curriculum, US Common Core, Australian Curriculum, New Zealand Curriculum
educationalAlignment.targetName: Downloadable and printable teaching materials across core primary subjects

name: School Plays & Assemblies for Primary Children
description: Original school plays and assemblies with scripts, songs, and staging ideas written specifically for primary and elementary-aged children. Designed to be fun, meaningful, and easy to stage â€” perfect for end-of-term shows, class assemblies, and seasonal performances.

educationalAlignment.educationalFramework: UK National Curriculum, Ontario Curriculum, Australian Curriculum
educationalAlignment.targetName: Drama and performance opportunities for primary-aged learners

name: Silly School Education
description: Silly School Education is a teacher-led educational platform providing curriculum-aligned songs, videos, and printable teaching resources for primary and elementary school teachers worldwide. With over 45 million YouTube views and a growing subscriber base, the platform supports educators through creative, classroom-ready content across all major subjects.
